h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h2 data-id="heading-0">HTML</h2>
<h4 data-id="heading-1">meta viewport</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html copyable" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">head</span> <span class="hljs-attr">lang</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”en”</span>></span> 标准的 lang 属性写法
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">charset</span>=<span class="hljs-string">’utf-8′</span>></span>    声明文档使用的字符编码
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">http-equiv</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”X-UA-Compatible”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”IE</span>=<span class="hljs-string">edge,chrome</span>=<span class="hljs-string">1″/</span>></span>   优先使用 IE 最新版本和 Chrome
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”description”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”不超过150个字符”/</span>></span>       页面描述
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”keywords”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">””/</span>></span>      页面关键词
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”author”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”name,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">email</span>@<span class="hljs-attr">gmail.com</span>”/></span>    网页作者
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”robots”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”index,follow”/</span>></span>      搜索引擎抓取
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”viewport”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”initial-scale</span>=<span class="hljs-string">1,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">maximum-scale</span>=<span class="hljs-string">3,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">minimum-scale</span>=<span class="hljs-string">1,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">user-scalable</span>=<span class="hljs-string">no”</span>></span> 为移动设备添加 viewport
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”apple-mobile-web-app-title”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”标题”</span>></span> iOS 设备 begin
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”apple-mobile-web-app-capable”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”yes”/</span>></span>  添加到主屏后的标题（iOS 6 新增）
是否启用 WebApp 全屏模式，删除苹果默认的工具栏和菜单栏
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”apple-itunes-app”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”app-id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">myAppStoreID,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">affiliate-data</span>=<span class="hljs-string">myAffiliateData,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">app-argument</span>=<span class="hljs-string">myURL”</span>></span>
添加智能 App 广告条 Smart App Banner（iOS 6+ Safari）
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”black”/</span>></span>
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”format-detection”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”telphone</span>=<span class="hljs-string">no,</span> <span class="hljs-attr">email</span>=<span class="hljs-string">no”/</span>></span>  设置苹果工具栏颜色
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”renderer”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”webkit”</span>></span>  启用360浏览器的极速模式(webkit)
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">http-equiv</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”X-UA-Compatible”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”IE</span>=<span class="hljs-string">edge”</span>></span>     避免IE使用兼容模式
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">http-equiv</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”Cache-Control”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”no-siteapp”</span> /></span>    不让百度转码
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”HandheldFriendly”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”true”</span>></span>     针对手持设备优化，主要是针对一些老的不识别viewport的浏览器，比如黑莓
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”MobileOptimized”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”320″</span>></span>   微软的老式浏览器
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”screen-orientation”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”portrait”</span>></span>   uc强制竖屏
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”x5-orientation”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”portrait”</span>></span>    QQ强制竖屏
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”full-screen”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”yes”</span>></span>              UC强制全屏
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”x5-fullscreen”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”true”</span>></span>       QQ强制全屏
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”browsermode”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”application”</span>></span>   UC应用模式
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”x5-page-mode”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”app”</span>></span>    QQ应用模式
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">name</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”msapplication-tap-highlight”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”no”</span>></span>    windows phone 点击无高光
设置页面不缓存
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">http-equiv</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”pragma”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”no-cache”</span>></span>
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">http-equiv</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”cache-control”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”no-cache”</span>></span>
<span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">http-equiv</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”expires”</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">”0″</span>></span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">CSS</h2>
<h4 data-id="heading-3">盒模型</h4>
<ul>
<li>
<p><code>ie</code> 盒子模型：包括 <code>content</code>、<code>padding</code>、<code>border</code>、<code>margin</code>。其中 <code>width</code> = <code>content</code> + <code>padding</code> + <code>border</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>标准 <code>w3c</code> 盒子模型：包括 <code>content</code>、<code>padding</code>、<code>border</code>、<code>margin</code>。其中 <code>width</code> = <code>content</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>W3C</code> 在 <code>CSS3</code> 中新增了 <code>box-sizing</code> 的样式，属性包含 <code>content-box</code> 和 <code>border-box</code>；<code>content-box</code> 就是默认的样式，<code>border-box</code> 是 <code>width</code> 包含了<code>content</code> + <code>padding</code> + <code>border</code>。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css">// <span class="hljs-attribute">content</span>-box 元素的 <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span> = <span class="hljs-attribute">content</span> + <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span> + <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.box-sizing</span> &#123;  
    <span class="hljs-attribute">box-sizing</span>:content-box;  
    <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>:<span class="hljs-number">200px</span>;  
    <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>:<span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;  
    <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>:<span class="hljs-number">15px</span> solid <span class="hljs-number">#eee</span>;  
&#125; 

// <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>-box 元素的 <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span> = <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>（用样式指定的宽度）
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.box-sizing</span>&#123;  
    <span class="hljs-attribute">box-sizing</span>:border-box;  
    <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>:<span class="hljs-number">200px</span>;  
    <span class="hljs-attribute">padding</span>:<span class="hljs-number">10px</span>;  
    <span class="hljs-attribute">border</span>:<span class="hljs-number">15px</span> solid <span class="hljs-number">#eee</span>;  
&#125;  
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
</li>
<li>
<p>为了在不同平台（机子）使其表现行为一致，而 <code>box-sizing</code> 又具有继承性，所以会在项目初始化的时候，会统一设置成某一种盒子模型</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-4"><code>margin</code> 塌陷问题和 <code>margin</code> 合并问题</h4>
<ul>
<li>塌陷问题：在文档流中，父元素的高度默认是被子元素撑开的，就是子元素有多高，父元素就有多高，当子元素设置浮动或者相关定位，子元素会完全脱离文档流，此时将会导致子元素无法撑开父元素的高度，导致父元素高度塌陷，一般处理方案得看具体情况，若是浮动，就清除浮动，若是定位，则借助某些dom计算出子元素的宽高，然后设置父元素<code>padding</code>或<code>margin</code></li>
<li>合并问题：处于上下位置关系的两个容器，在通过<code>margin-top</code>、<code>margin-bottom</code>改变间距时，如果两个属性的值相同时，则两容器间的距离就是这个值；如果两个属性的值不同，则取较大值作为两容器间的距离；</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-5"><a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FGuide%2FCSS%2FBlock_formatting_context" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FGuide%2FCSS%2FBlock_formatting_context" target="_blank">块格式化上下文（BFC）</a></h4>
<p><code>BFC</code> 是 <code>Web</code> 页面的可视化 <code>CSS</code> 渲染的一部分，是块盒子的布局过程发生的区域，也是浮动元素与其他元素交互的区域。下列方式会创建块格式化上下文：</p>
<ul>
<li>根元素(``)</li>
<li>浮动元素（元素的 <code>float</code> 不是 <code>none</code>）</li>
<li>绝对定位元素（元素的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fposition" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fposition" target="_blank"><code>position</code></a> 为 <code>absolute</code> 或 <code>fixed</code>）</li>
<li>行内块元素（元素的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" target="_blank"><code>display</code></a> 为 <code>inline-block</code>）</li>
<li>表格单元格（元素的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" target="_blank"><code>display</code></a>为 <code>table-cell</code>，HTML表格单元格默认为该值）</li>
<li>表格标题（元素的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" target="_blank"><code>display</code></a> 为 <code>table-caption</code>，HTML表格标题默认为该值）</li>
<li>匿名表格单元格元素（元素的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" target="_blank"><code>display</code></a>为 <code>table、``table-row</code>、 <code>table-row-group、``table-header-group、``table-footer-group</code>（分别是HTML table、row、tbody、thead、tfoot的默认属性）或 <code>inline-table</code>）</li>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Foverflow" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Foverflow" target="_blank"><code>overflow</code></a> 值不为 <code>visible</code> 的块元素</li>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" target="_blank"><code>display</code></a> 值为 <code>flow-root</code> 的元素</li>
<li><a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fcontain" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fcontain" target="_blank"><code>contain</code></a> 值为 <code>layout</code>、<code>content</code>或 paint 的元素</li>
<li>弹性元素（<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" target="_blank"><code>display</code></a>为 <code>flex</code> 或 <code>inline-flex</code>元素的直接子元素）</li>
<li>网格元素（<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fdisplay" target="_blank"><code>display</code></a>为 <code>grid</code> 或 <code>inline-grid</code> 元素的直接子元素）</li>
<li>多列容器（元素的 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fcolumn-count" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fcolumn-count" target="_blank"><code>column-count</code></a> 或 <a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fcolumn-width" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fdeveloper.mozilla.org%2Fzh-CN%2Fdocs%2FWeb%2FCSS%2Fcolumn-width" target="_blank"><code>column-width</code></a> 不为 <code>auto，包括 ``column-count</code> 为 <code>1</code>）</li>
<li><code>column-span</code> 为 <code>all</code> 的元素始终会创建一个新的BFC，即使该元素没有包裹在一个多列容器中（<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fw3c%2Fcsswg-drafts%2Fcommit%2Fa8634b96900279916bd6c505fda88dda71d8ec51" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fgithub.com%2Fw3c%2Fcsswg-drafts%2Fcommit%2Fa8634b96900279916bd6c505fda88dda71d8ec51" target="_blank">标准变更</a>，<a href="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fbugs.chromium.org%2Fp%2Fchromium%2Fissues%2Fdetail%3Fid%3D709362" title="https://link.juejin.cn/?target=https%3A%2F%2Fbugs.chromium.org%2Fp%2Fchromium%2Fissues%2Fdetail%3Fid%3D709362" target="_blank">Chrome bug</a>）。</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-6">居中的方法（水平+垂直）</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css">// felx布局
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.levy-center</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: flex;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">justify-content</span>: center;
<span class="hljs-attribute">align-items</span>: center;
&#125;
// CSS3中新增的<span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>属性
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.levy-center</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>:absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>:<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>:<span class="hljs-built_in">translate</span>(-<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>,-<span class="hljs-number">50%</span>);
&#125;
// 绝对定位方式, 负值的<span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.levy-center</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>:absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1000px</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">left</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-left</span>: -<span class="hljs-number">500px</span>;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-7">利用padding自适应高度占位</h4>
<p>当margin/padding取形式为<code>百分比</code>的值时，无论是<code>left/right</code>，还是<code>top/bottom</code>，都是以<code>父元素的width</code>为参照物。自适应的精髓在于宽度，<code>margin/padding</code>设置百分比弥补了元素高度无法<strong>自适应地</strong>与元素宽度保持一致的缺陷。</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-html copyable" lang="html"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">div</span> <span class="hljs-attr">id</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"container"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">class</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"placeholder"</span>></span>
  <span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-name">img</span> <span class="hljs-attr">src</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://img.arrayhuang.cn/product/miya-1060079/multiple/0.jpg@1e_415w_415h_1c_0i_1o_1x.jpg"</span> /></span>
<span class="hljs-tag"></<span class="hljs-name">div</span>></span>
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-id">#container</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">50%</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: relative;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">background-color</span>: red;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden; //需要触发BFC消除<span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span>折叠的问题
&#125;
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.placeholder</span>:after &#123;
  content: <span class="hljs-string">''</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: block;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">margin-top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>; //<span class="hljs-attribute">margin</span> 百分比相对父元素宽度计算
&#125;
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">img</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">position</span>: absolute;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">top</span>: <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">width</span>: <span class="hljs-number">100%</span>;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<ul>
<li>其它的宽高自适应方案：单位<code>vw</code>，就是以屏幕宽度为参照物的，只要给元素的<code>width</code>和<code>height</code>都用上<code>vw</code>单位，那<code>width</code>跟<code>height</code>就可以轻易设成一样</li>
</ul>
<h4 data-id="heading-8">触摸屏当中的元素滚动</h4>
<p>如果你需要在触摸屏当中为一些元素设置内滚动，那么你不仅需要 <code>overflow: scroll / auto</code> ，还需要 <code>-webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch</code>;</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.class</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: auto;
  -webkit-<span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>-scrolling: touch;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-9">移动端页面布局（头部，底部固定，中间由内容撑搞）</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.box</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">display</span>: flex;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">flex-direction</span>: column;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-comment">/* 固高 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.box-item-height</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">height</span>: xxxrem;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-comment">/* 撑满剩余的 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-class">.box-item-overflow</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">flex</span>: <span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: auto;
  -webkit-<span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>-scrolling: touch;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-10">隐藏滚动条</h4>
<p>有时滚动并不想出现滚动条，可以使用 <code>-webkit-scrollbar</code> 实现</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css">::-webkit-scrollbar &#123;
  display: none;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-11">关于 input placeholder 有时顶部对齐的情况</h4>
<p><code>input placeholder</code> 在不同的机器中表现的并不一致（华为机器特别明显），我的解决的方式是：</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-tag">input</span>::-webkit-input-placeholder &#123;
  line-height: <span class="hljs-number">30px</span>;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-comment">/* 使用webkit内核的浏览器 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">input</span>:-moz-placeholder &#123;
  line-height: <span class="hljs-number">30px</span>;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-comment">/* Firefox版本4-18 */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">input</span>::-moz-placeholder &#123;
  line-height: <span class="hljs-number">30px</span>;
&#125;
<span class="hljs-comment">/* Firefox版本19+ */</span>
<span class="hljs-selector-tag">input</span>:-ms-input-placeholder &#123;
  line-height: <span class="hljs-number">30px</span>;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-12">文本溢出问题</h4>
<p>单行文本溢出处理</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.class</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden;
  white-wrap: nowrap;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">text-overflow</span>: ellipsis;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<p>多行文本溢出处理</p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.class</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">overflow</span>: hidden;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">word-break</span>: break-all;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">text-overflow</span>: ellipsis;
  -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
  -webkit-line-clamp: <span class="hljs-number">4</span>; //<span class="hljs-number">4</span>表示第四行溢出，换成<span class="hljs-number">2</span>就是只显示两行，并且第二行显示溢出的三个点点
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-13">禁止用户选中文本</h4>
<p>使用 <code>user-select</code></p>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.class</span> &#123;
  user-select: none;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-14">清除手机 tap 事件后 element 时候出现的一个高亮</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css">* &#123;
  -webkit-tap-highlight-<span class="hljs-attribute">color</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">rgba</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>, <span class="hljs-number">0</span>);
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-15">使用 CSS <code>transforms</code> 或者 <code>animations</code> 时可能会有页面闪烁的 bug</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.class</span> &#123;
  -webkit-<span class="hljs-attribute">backface-visibility</span>: hidden;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-16">-webkit-touch-callout 禁止长按链接与图片弹出菜单</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.class</span> &#123;
  -webkit-touch-callout: none;
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h4 data-id="heading-17">使用硬件加速</h4>
<pre><code class="hljs language-css copyable" lang="css"><span class="hljs-selector-class">.class</span> &#123;
  <span class="hljs-attribute">transform</span>: <span class="hljs-built_in">translateZ</span>(<span class="hljs-number">0</span>);
&#125;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre></div>  
</div>
